main event: A trained observer reported seeing a UFO resembling a silver half-moon over Burbank, California on August 1, 1958.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about 60 feet in diameter, observed through binoculars for 6-7 minutes, The sighting was tracked on radar, The observer noted an apparent vapor trail behind the object, The object moved randomly before disappearing, There were inconsistencies in the witness's statements regarding the sighting.
